messages.registerSuccess: Registration successful! You can log in.
messages.confirmationEmailContent:
The password reset process has been initiated and an email has been sent to your email address containing instructions on what to do next. Please check your email address.

If you did not receive the email with instructions, please do not forget to check your junk mail folder. We kindly ask you to add our email address to your safe senders list.
